name: MXMetricPayload
desc: An object that encapsulates a daily metrics report.

items.name: var cellularConditionMetrics: MXCellularConditionMetric?
items.desc: The cellular condition measurements for the reporting period.

items.name: var cpuMetrics: MXCPUMetric?
items.desc: The CPU metrics for the reporting period.

items.name: var displayMetrics: MXDisplayMetric?
items.desc: The display metrics for the reporting period.

items.name: var gpuMetrics: MXGPUMetric?
items.desc: The GPU metrics for the reporting period.

items.name: var locationActivityMetrics: MXLocationActivityMetric?
items.desc: The location-tracking activity for the reporting period.

items.name: var networkTransferMetrics: MXNetworkTransferMetric?
items.desc: The network-transfer activity for the reporting period.

items.name: var applicationExitMetrics: MXAppExitMetric?
items.desc: The app foreground and background exit metrics for the reporting period.

items.name: var applicationTimeMetrics: MXAppRunTimeMetric?
items.desc: The app foreground and background time metrics for the reporting period.

items.name: var memoryMetrics: MXMemoryMetric?
items.desc: The memory metrics for the reporting period.

items.name: var applicationLaunchMetrics: MXAppLaunchMetric?
items.desc: The app launch and resume metrics for the reporting period.

items.name: var animationMetrics: MXAnimationMetric?
items.desc: The metrics for the responsiveness of app animations for the reporting period.

items.name: var applicationResponsivenessMetrics: MXAppResponsivenessMetric?
items.desc: The metrics indicating an app's responsiveness to user interaction for the reporting period.

items.name: var diskIOMetrics: MXDiskIOMetric?
items.desc: The storage metrics for the reporting period.

items.name: var signpostMetrics: [MXSignpostMetric]?
items.desc: An array of the custom metrics for the reporting period.

items.name: func jsonRepresentation() -> Data
items.desc: Returns the contents of the payload in JSON format.

items.name: var timeStampBegin: Date
items.desc: The starting time of the reporting period.

items.name: var timeStampEnd: Date
items.desc: The ending time of the reporting period.

items.name: var includesMultipleApplicationVersions: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean indicating if the version of the app changed at least once during the reporting period.

items.name: var latestApplicationVersion: String
items.desc: The version of the app on the device at the end of the reporting period.

items.name: var metaData: MXMetaData?
items.desc: A set of system-level information for the device.
